meanings.definition: A metal container used to collect ashes from a fireplace or stove.
meanings.sent1: After cleaning the fireplace, I emptied the ashpan outside.
meanings.sent2: The ashpan under the stove needed to be emptied regularly.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the ashpan was a new bed and curled up inside.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like an overflowing ashpan, full of thoughts waiting to be cleared.
meanings.sent5: The shiny ashpan gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting its purpose clearly.

meanings.definition: The part of a locomotive or furnace where ashes are collected.
meanings.sent1: The engineer checked the ashpan before starting the train's engine.
meanings.sent2: The ashpan of the locomotive was full and needed to be emptied.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended the ashpan was a treasure chest full of gold.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt heavy, like an ashpan burdened with the weight of the world.
meanings.sent5: The ashpan of the furnace rumbled as it collected the remnants of burnt coal.
